issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

fields.summary: Android: backgroundImage property does not work on a View and ImageView that is part of a tab window

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
See the images attached.

The markup:
{code:xml}
<Alloy>
  <TabGroup>
    
    <Tab title="Window">
      <Window title="Window" backgroundImage="appicon.png">
        <Label color="green">Window: 'appicon.png' is shown as background image.</Label>
      </Window>
    </Tab>
    
    <Tab title="View">
      <Window title="View">
        <View backgroundImage="appicon.png">
          <Label color="red">View: 'appicon.png' is NOT shown background image.</Label>
        </View>
      </Window>
    </Tab>
    
    <Tab title="ImageView">
      <Window title="ImageView">
        <Label color="red">Window: ImageView is NOT shown.</Label>
        <ImageView image="appicon.png">
          <Label color="red">ImageView: 'appicon.png' is NOT shown.</Label>
        </ImageView>
      </Window>
    </Tab>
    
    <Tab title="ImageView">
      <Window title="ImageView">
        <Label color="red">Window: ImageView is NOT shown.</Label>
        <ImageView backgroundImage="appicon.png">
          <Label color="red">ImageView: 'appicon.png' is NOT shown background image.</Label>
        </ImageView>
      </Window>
    </Tab>
    
  </TabGroup>
</Alloy>
{code}
fields.summary: Android: Images are not getting displayed in ImageView and View

comments.body:
Hi there,
could you pay attention to the issue, please?
Imho, the bug is a kind of critical. Don't you think so?
This is basically related to TIMOB-16983. I will update this test case in TIMOB-16983. Make sense?
Resolving this ticket as a duplicate of TIMOB-16983. I have updated TIMOB-16983 to add ImageView test case from this ticket.
